entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 6.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 55 %

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Rain beginning near midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 5 with temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with snow changing to snow in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 5 with temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
